'Half-Life 2', the brilliant and bloody sequel to one of the best and most progressive games of all time.

To read more, click here.

I didn’t agree with the last sentence. “I feel that gamers who get through this find themselves in a place of almost spiritual connection with the game that birthed them.”

The article itself is very inspiring and gives you a view into the minds of professional gamers. One thing that I don’t agree with is the people saying that gamers are not mature enough to engage with video games. That does not account for players who can not play at all. I can’t play ‘FIFA’, and I am a professional gamer. I still get lost in the gameplay and it’s still an amazing game. I can’t comprehend how someone can play ‘FIFA’ for any extended amount of time, so I can’t understand why someone who can play it for hours on end would feel alienated from playing a game. It is a video game and anyone who plays it has the ability to get lost in it. I am thankful that my group is so open-minded and curious about new things. For anyone reading this who doesn’t have the ability to play video games and feel alienated by them, you are in good company. You should be grateful for the things that you do have, rather than be bummed out by what you do not. If anything, I feel bad for people who have never played video games because of the insight that they can gain into gaming. “Half-Life 2” is one of the greatest games ever made, and it would be a shame if people who have never played the game never experienced it.

Now I see what is all those hoax and chaos of fans wanting Half Life 3 is about..
MAKE HALF LIFE 3 YOU Mr. GABEN, NOW!!

I only recently played this for the first time. Being one of maybe twelve people on earth who thought the original Half-Life was kinda meh, Portal was all I really cared about when a friend gifted me the Orange Box back in, what, '08? '07?. Didn't even touch this game or either of the episodes. 

Takes a big person to admit they fucked up. This game is the perfect FPS. A master class in level design, mission variety, and combat mechanics. I'm usually not too crazy about linear games like this, but this one does it right. Nothing gets old or repetitive. Every level shakes things up really well. You get into firefights on a waverunner, trudge through zombie-infested neighborhoods, command hordes of giant insect aliens, drive around the countryside in a dune buggy while occasionally stopping to snipe people. There's just never a dull moment. And the combat mechanics are smooth as butter. One hell of a game. 

And then you have the episodes to look forward to!

剧情线比较长，使得我历时久远断断续续终于通关。(关键其他想玩的太多，就跑偏了？)
1、画质相较半条命1还是非常不错的，毕竟玩过CS：起源，好评！
2、沙地陷阱那种先被蚁狮追成狗的惊恐和后成蚁狮大魔头的幸福形成鲜明对比！好评！
3、猎头蟹怼我一脸，僵尸头戴猎头蟹突然从水里冒出来，黑色猎头蟹把你蛰成1血，都是突然惊吓的恐怖片！
4、G-man最后的黑白语言讲述是终极恐怖片！(G-man你怎么老了？哦，我也老了)
5、V社再不出3，我就真的真·老了！！！
好评送上。未来，我王境泽就是饿死，也不想再看到猎头蟹跳我一脸！

Kontynuacja świetnej gry o nazwie half life w której wcielamy się w doktora Freemana który po kilkunastu minutach gry dobywa swojego legendarnego oręża o nazwie łom i rusza w długą podróż aby zniszczyć cytadele która jest wręcz wypełniona kombinatem.
Podczas drogi do cytadeli odbędzie się wiele różnych eventów jak naprzykład powstanie przeciwko kombinatowi a my musimy stanąć na jej czele. Ta gra jest wręcz świetna każdy jej zakamarek jest przemyślany i dobrze zrobiony fabuła jest dobra a i broni jest też sporo według mnie ta gra to arcydzieło szkoda że Valve nie potrafi liczyć do 3 bo bym z chęcią zagrał w 3 half life.

Niewątpliwie pomimo upływu tych 15 lat HL2 jeszcze nie zdążył się przestarzeć. Panowie z Valve naprawdę się postarali. Wspaniała muzyka, mapy, oprawa graficzna zrobiła na mnie duże wrażenie. W ostatnich rozdziałach jest jednak trochę przynudnawo, ze względu na nieprzerwane walki w trudnych okolicznościach i monotematycznym zawalonym smieciami terenie; zabrakło tych logicznych zagadek których było dużo na początkach gry. Poza tym gra się dobrze, zasłużone 10/10

Pure classic, I hope we receive a third game someday.

Eu joguei o primeiro Half-Life e curti demais. Era difícil e era legal, consegui zerar com muito custo. Depois que saiu o segundo e vi que era algo melhorado, eu não pensei duas vezes e comprei-o!
E era/é mesmo. Muita coisa no jogo foi melhorada além do visual. Mesmo apesar de não curtir as partes que tem que dirigir algo, ainda assim o jogo me divirto muito.

O primeiro jogo traz aquela sensação de cárcere, que te faz sentir que você deve escapar daquela loucura. Eu senti falta disso nesse, mas acabou me trazendo outra perspectiva, de fuga. Sem contar as novas armas, inimigos e acessórios...
Valeu muito a pena ter jogo. Eu não jogo com tanta frequência, por estar jogando outros jogos juntos, mas ele continua instalado sempre. :D

É um ótimo FPS, com uma história muito boa que vale a ser jogado!

I've played this game for years and finally I could purchase it on Steam. Half-Life 2 is one of the most important games of its generation because it was one of the most anticipated, due to the fact that Half-Life redefined the FPS genre when it came out in 1998. Gordon Freeman, put again in the world by G-Man, grabs his trusty crowbar and some new weapons such as the almost always useful Gravity Gun, which brought a whole bunch of new mechanics using the physics simulation provided by the Source engine.

A masterpiece by Valve that would enamore players all around the world, with its storytelling, its gameplay, and the world it put in front of us, ready to be purged from the Combine.

Unfortunately, as good as HL2 and its two episodes were, we were left on such a cliffhanger that fans have been waiting for the conclusion for years. Hopefully we can get some solid news soon.

Overall, Half-Life 2 is one of my favorite games of all time, that helped me realise about my passion for gaming (that and Super Mario Bros. and Zelda). 

Score: 9/10 (Because it has some minor flaws but that don't overshadow all the good in it).
Valve  Where is half life 3 ????? PLS GIVE HALF LIFE 3

Luego de haberme pasado el modo campaña dos veces ¿Que mas puedo decir que ya nadie dijo antes?

La jugabilidad es mil veces mejor a la de Half-Life 1, estan las armas clasicas pero tambien nuevas, hay muchas formas nuevas de matar a los enemigos, algunas son muy originales, la dificultad esta mucho mas balanceada pero sin duda la mejor implementacion fue la pistola antigravedad, ya sea que quieras alcanzar un objeto, devolver una granada, volar cosas por los aires, tirar barriles explosivos y joder a los enemigos lanzandoles retretes, esa arma es todo un mar de posibilidades

Aqui se nota que le pusieron esfuerzo a la historia la cual por momentos resulta intrigante, los personajes son mucho mas elaborados y expresivos, aunque lamentablemente el doblaje al español (que es una porqueria) la caga un poco, el combate es mas fluido y gracias a las oportunidades que ofrece el juego hay muchas maneras distintas de combatir, disparos, lanzamientos, etc...

En conclusion, Half-Life 2 es una entrega que supo tomar muchas cosas que le dieron encanto al primer juego y mejorarlas por completo 10/10

PD: ¿PARA CUANDO HALF-LIFE 3?
